sys_script_include.description: Returns an e-mail address --> looks up in User table record with an argumetn as sys_id
sys_script_include.name: GetEmailAddress

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1aa084a50709a01063c4f1e08c1ed055
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_560734_projector.GetEmailAddress</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Returns an e-mail address --> looks up in User table record with an argumetn as sys_id</description><name>GetEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[var GetEmailAddress = Class.create();

GetEmailAddress.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function() {
		
		var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
		return userRecord.email + '';
    },

    type: 'GetEmailAddress'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-12 12:24:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>1aa084a50709a01063c4f1e08c1ed055</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetEmailAddress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Projector1" source="x_560734_projector">fbb3427007cd201063c4f1e08c1ed0c3</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Projector1">fbb3427007cd201063c4f1e08c1ed0c3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1aa084a50709a01063c4f1e08c1ed055</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-12 12:31:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
